data.question: What is the quadrupole separation measured at 80 K for the doublet characterized by the larger quadrupole separation?
At what temperature were the parameters of the doublet with the larger quadrupole separation measured?
Is the iron site corresponding to the smaller quadrupole separation in a more or less distorted octahedral environment?
Does Complex 2 represent a missing link in the series of precursors for mineralized iron(III) compounds?
What ligand might allow further controlled polymerization of the iron chain in Complex 2?
Was the synthesis of 1 described in the experimental procedure?
What was the yield of the synthesis described for Complex 2?
What technique was used to measure magnetic susceptibility data?
At what temperature range was the magnetic susceptibility data collected?
Does the spectrum of 2 in acetonitrile indicate that it does not dissociate in solution?
What does the resonance Raman spectra of 2 show?
data.answer: A Fe-O vibration from a linear Fe-O-Fe unit

data.question: What type of crystals were obtained from ethyl acetate/acetonitrile for Complex 2?
What space group does Complex 2 . EtOAc crystallize in?
Was the structure of Complex 2 solved by direct methods?
What is the effective magnetic field measured at 7 K when an external magnetic field of 2 Tesla was applied?
What is the purpose of applying a weak magnetic field in Mossbauer spectroscopy?
data.answer: To reach a static state and observe the internal magnetic field
